TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Pacavalj, title = Pacavalj, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pacavalj} }

S.FORM: alang Pacavalj ga niya mki sku Tayto Keng atu Taybu go (Dawu), kwara sali buwan nya ga 467 buwan, 1,217 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 97% kyan ku 1,180 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 3% kyan ku 37 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Paywan 93%, Amis 3%, Puyuma 1%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Pacavalj hya' ga Seqeciin. tay mkyahu' na Pacavalj hya' ga Ku shushu . rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Pacavalj ga niya mki sko Tayto Keng ato Taybo go (Dawo), kwara sali bowan nya ga 467 bowan, 1,217 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 97% kyan ko 1,180 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 3% kyan ko 37 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Paywan 93%, Amis 3%, Poyoma 1%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Pacavalj hya' ga Seqeciin. tay mkyaho' na Pacavalj hya' ga Ko shosho . rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy. toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
